mapper.sql: select id, username,applet_open_id,app_open_id,h5_open_id, password, nickname, image, firstname, lastname, nationality, nationality_id, idtype, cardid, certificate1,certificate2,certificate3,certificate4, gender, birthday, monthly_income, marriage_status, mobile, areacode, email, modified_email, check_code, country, province, city, county, detailaddress, interest, introduction, store_id, type, consumption_amount, paypassword, source, status, sign_num, is_mobile_verification, is_email_verification, is_google_verification, google_authenticator, google_url, realname_screen_status, allow_fiat_withdraw, allow_crypto_withdraw, login_error_count, del_flag, create_time, modify_time, del_time, lock_time, last_login_time, recommended, s_recommended, self_recommend_code, commission, commission_frozen, belone_store_id from ums_member
mapper.select: select * from ums_member where h5_open_id = #{h5OpenId}
select um.id,um.username as name from ums_member um where (select count(1) as num from settlement_account sa where sa.associate_id=um.id) = 0
select * from ums_member where app_open_id = #{appOpenId}
select * from ums_member where applet_open_id = #{appletOpenId}
select * from ums_member where id = #{id}
mapper.update:
update ums_member set del_flag = '1' , del_time = now(),username=concat(username,'-del-',UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3))) ,mobile=concat(mobile,'-del-',UNIX_TIMESTAMP(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(3))) where id in
#{item}

update ums_member
username = #{username},
nickname = #{nickname},
image = #{image},
firstname = #{firstname},
lastname = #{lastname},
nationality = #{nationality},
nationality_id = #{nationalityId},
idtype = #{idtype},
cardid = #{cardid},
certificate1 = #{certificate1},
certificate2 = #{certificate2},
certificate3 = #{certificate3},
certificate4 = #{certificate4},
gender = #{gender},
birthday = #{birthday},
monthly_income = #{monthlyIncome},
marriage_status = #{marriageStatus},
country = #{country},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
county = #{county},
detailaddress = #{detailaddress},
interest = #{interest},
introduction = #{introduction},
recommended=#{recommended},
modify_time = now()
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ums_member where username=#{username}
mapper.update: UPDATE ums_member SET last_login_time=now() WHERE id=#{customerId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ums_member WHERE `type`='2' AND status='1' AND store_id=#{storeId}

select count(1) from ums_member where store_id=#{storeId} AND `type`=3
AND username like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}),'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE ums_member SET status=#{status} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE ums_member SET password=#{password} WHERE id=#{id}
UPDATE ums_member SET store_id=#{storeId},`type`=#{type} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from ums_member where (username = #{username} or mobile = #{username} or email=#{username})
select * from ums_member where (username = #{username} or mobile = #{username} or email=#{username})
mapper.update: update ums_member set login_error_count = 0 ,lock_time = null where id = #{customerId}
update ums_member set login_error_count = login_error_count+1 where id = #{customerId}
update ums_member set lock_time = now() where id = #{customerId}
update ums_member set realname_screen_status = #{realnameScreened,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{customerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
update ums_member set allow_fiat_withdraw = #{allowFiatWithdraw} where id = #{customerId}
update ums_member set allow_crypto_withdraw = #{allowCryptoWithdraw} where id = #{customerId}
mapper.select: select count(1) from ums_member where mobile = #{mobile}
select count(1) from ums_member where email = #{email}
mapper.update: update ums_member set password = #{password} where id = #{customerId}
update ums_member set paypassword = #{payPassword} where id = #{customerId}
update ums_member set username = #{mobile} , mobile = #{mobile} where id = #{customerId}
update ums_member set password = #{password} where mobile = #{mobile}
update ums_member set consumption_amount = consumption_amount+#{orderMoney} where id = #{customerId}
update ums_member set commission = commission+#{commission} where id = #{customerId}
update ums_member set commission_frozen = commission_frozen+#{commissionFrozen} where id = #{customerId}
update ums_member set commission_frozen = commission_frozen-#{commisson}, commission = commission+#{commission} where id = #{customerId}
mapper.select:
select * from ums_member where del_flag='0' and id IN
#{id}
SELECT * from ums_member where del_flag='0'
mapper.update: update ums_member set modified_email=#{modifiedEmail},check_code=#{checkCode} where id=#{customerId}
update ums_member set email=modified_email, modified_email='',check_code='',is_email_verification='1' where id=#{customerId}
mapper.select: select * from ums_member where id=#{customerId} and check_code =#{checkCode}
mapper.update:
update ums_member set
sign_num=sign_num+1
sign_num=1
where id=#{customerId}
mapper.select: select count(1) from ums_member where DATE(create_time) = DATE(now())
select count(1) from ums_member where YEARWEEK(date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')- INTERVAL 1 DAY) = YEARWEEK(now()- INTERVAL 1 DAY)

select DATE(create_time) as 'newCustomerTime',count(1) as 'newCustomerNum' from ums_member where YEARWEEK(date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')- INTERVAL 1 DAY) = YEARWEEK(now()- INTERVAL 1 DAY) group by DATE(create_time) order by create_time
select mobile from ums_member where del_flag='0' and store_id=0 and mobile !=''
select recommended from (select distinct recommended from ums_member where del_flag='0' and recommended != -1) a limit #{startRowNum},#{pageSize}
select count(1) from (select distinct recommended from ums_member where del_flag='0' and recommended != -1) a
select * from ums_member where recommended = #{customerId}
select count(1) from ums_member where recommended = #{customerId}
where id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into ums_member
username, password, nickname, image, firstname, lastname, nationality, nationality_id, idtype, cardid, certificate1, certificate2, certificate3, certificate4, gender, birthday, monthly_income, marriage_status, mobile, areacode, email, modified_email, check_code, country, province, city, county, detailaddress, interest, introduction, store_id, type, consumption_amount, paypassword, source, status, sign_num, is_mobile_verification, is_email_verification, realname_screen_status, is_google_verification, google_authenticator, google_url, allow_fiat_withdraw, allow_crypto_withdraw, login_error_count, del_flag, create_time, modify_time, del_time, lock_time, last_login_time, recommended, s_recommended, self_recommend_code, commission, commission_frozen, belone_store_id, applet_open_id, app_open_id, h5_open_id,
#{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{image}, #{firstname}, #{lastname}, #{nationality}, #{nationalityId}, #{idtype}, #{cardid}, #{certificate1}, #{certificate2}, #{certificate3}, #{certificate4}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{monthlyIncome}, #{marriageStatus}, #{mobile}, #{areacode}, #{email}, #{modifiedEmail}, #{checkCode}, #{country}, #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{detailaddress}, #{interest}, #{introduction}, #{storeId}, #{type}, #{consumptionAmount}, #{paypassword}, #{source}, #{status}, #{signNum}, #{isMobileVerification}, #{isEmailVerification}, #{realnameScreenStatus}, #{isGoogleVerification}, #{googleAuthenticator}, #{googleUrl}, #{allowFiatWithdraw}, #{allowCryptoWithdraw}, #{loginErrorCount}, #{delFlag}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{delTime}, #{lockTime}, #{lastLoginTime}, #{recommended}, #{sRecommended}, #{selfRecommendCode}, #{commissionFrozen}, #{beloneStoreId},
#{appletOpenId},, #{appOpenId},, #{h5OpenId},,
mapper.delete:
delete from ums_member where id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * from ums_member where self_recommend_code = #{code}
